Navigation

Source: src/objects/navigation/navigation

The Navigation Object contains the main link and button elements for navigating different views and features.

Demonstration

Working N Y C Programs Opportunities Newsletter

Markup 

<!--{ @role        Use role='navigation' in production layouts. Identifies the nav as a major landmark }-->
<!--{ @aria-label  Ensures a unique landmark }-->
<!--{ @class       Add "o-navigation-fixed" in production layouts }-->
<nav aria-label="Primary Navigation" class="o-navigation bg-scale-2 " role="navigation">
  <a class="o-navigation__logo o-navigation__menu-item" href="https://cityofnewyork.github.io/working-nyc-patterns/demos/index">
    <span class="sr-only">Working N Y C</span>
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="hidden tablet:inline icon-logo-standard-menu-item fill-white text-blue-l-2">
      <use xlink:href="#logo-wnyc-standard"></use>
    </svg>
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="tablet:hidden icon-logo-stacked-menu-item fill-white text-blue-l-2">
      <use xlink:href="#logo-wnyc-stacked"></use>
    </svg>
  </a>
  <!--{ @class  Hide menu items for mobile using utilities }-->
  <a class="hidden desktop:inline-flex" href="https://cityofnewyork.github.io/working-nyc-patterns/demos/programs/index">Programs</a>
  <a class="hidden desktop:inline-flex" href="#">Opportunities</a>
  <a class="hidden desktop:inline-flex" href="https://cityofnewyork.github.io/working-nyc-patterns/demos/newsletter">Newsletter</a>
  <!--{ @class  The nav supports button elements using "btn-link" }-->
  <!--button class='o-navigation__menu-item btn-link' data-js='search' aria-controls='aria-c-search' aria-expanded='false'-->
  <!--  svg class='o-navigation__menu-icon icon-wnyc-ui'-->
  <!--    use xlink:href='#feather-search'-->
  <!--  span class='o-navigation__menu-label' Search-->
  <button aria-controls="aria-c-text-controller" aria-expanded="false" class="o-navigation__menu-item btn-link desktop:m-0" data-dropdown="open" data-dropdown-lock="true" data-js="dropdown">
    <svg class="o-navigation__menu-icon icon-wnyc-ui">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-wnyc-translate"></use>
    </svg>
    <span class="o-navigation__menu-label">Translate</span>
  </button>
  <button aria-controls="aria-c-mobile-menu" aria-expanded="false" class="o-navigation__menu-item btn-link desktop:hidden" data-js="mobile-menu" data-js-mobile-menu="open">
    <svg class="o-navigation__menu-icon icon-wnyc-ui">
      <use xlink:href="#feather-menu"></use>
    </svg>
    <span class="o-navigation__menu-label">Menu</span>
  </button>
</nav>
